programme.title: Bones
programme.desc: The team must navigate the two very different worlds while investigating the death of an ex-con turned yoga instructor; Booth works to regain Brennan's trust; Angela and Hodgins make a major decision.

programme.title: Bones
programme.desc: The team investigates a killing in which the crime scene points to a possible protege of Pelant; Angela second-guesses the decision to move to Paris; Brennan and Booth consider employment options.

programme.title: Bones
programme.desc: Six months after starting a new life with her family, Brennan becomes interested in a case to which she has personal ties; an FBI investigation begins when Booth goes missing.

programme.title: Bones
programme.desc: Booth's location and condition becomes more mysterious when it's discovered that FBI Agent Miller has been hiding vital information; Arastoo makes a significant decision.

programme.title: Bones
programme.desc: When Brennan officially returns to work at the Jeffersonian and Booth resumes his position at the FBI, remains are found at a fish farm; Hodgins encourages Angela to exhibit her photography work; Cam faces a difficult decision.

programme.title: Bones
programme.desc: Brennan enlists the help of a fellow forensic anthropologist; the investigation into the death of a real estate agent whose remains appear to have been destroyed by coyote-wolf hybrids.

programme.title: The Listener
programme.desc: Toby is forced to use his telepathic abilities to keep himself and others alive when he becomes a hostage in a bank heist.

programme.title: The Listener
programme.desc: Toby struggles with Alvin Klein during his first official investigation: a 10-year-old murder.

programme.title: The Listener
programme.desc: A performer's life is threatened, so Toby poses as her assistant and helps to investigate.

programme.title: The Listener
programme.desc: An African teenager, whose father is an alleged war criminal, is abducted.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: After students use e-mails and text messages to organize a spontaneous gathering at a golf course, the body of a high-school senior is found.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: The CSI team tracks the killer of an 18-year-old woman, an investigative aide for Alcohol Beverage Control who was monitoring underage drinking when she was murdered at a hip Miami nightclub.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: The wife of a famous Miami ballplayer is found murdered in her home, and her philandering husband is the prime suspect until his corpse is found in the house too.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: As a tidal wave heads toward Miami, Horatio and the team must stop a gang of bank robbers who are trying to take advantage of the natural disaster.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: A man is found dead after an evening of speed-dating, and detectives immediately suspect one of his dates, but the focus changes when the team learns the victim witnessed an assault.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: The team probes modern-day piracy after six bodies are found off the coast of Miami.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: The team delves into the complicated personal lives of members of Miami's judicial community after a man, in possession of a sexy DVD featuring a criminal judge, falls from a building, killing a pedestrian.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: A brutal carjacking turns into murder, and the team learns that the victim had a gambling problem that could have bankrupted the family business; Alexx hires a body hauler and must investigate when he is accused of stealing from the dead.

programme.title: Criminal Minds
programme.desc: The team investigates a series of murders with unidentifiable victims in Bakersfield, Calif.; agent Kate Callahan joins the team.

programme.title: Criminal Minds
programme.desc: The team members search for a vengeful suspect who was once abused; Garcia travels to Texas to confront the person she shot.

programme.title: Criminal Minds
programme.desc: The BAU team goes to Colorado to investigate when a passenger jet crashes; the incident reminds Kate of a family tragedy.

programme.title: Criminal Minds
programme.desc: A body is found covered in scratches, leading the BAU to believe that the person responsible has a chronic skin disorder.

programme.title: Criminal Minds
programme.desc: A child reappears one year after he went missing -- but the team must work quickly when a trick-or-treater disappears under similar circumstances.

programme.title: Criminal Minds
programme.desc: The team has a difficult time finding a common denominator among several male victims in Montana; J.J. struggles with feelings about her sister's death.

programme.title: Criminal Minds
programme.desc: The team believes a suspect is taking on the persona of an Internet urban legend when people with substantial social media followings are found dead; Savannah and Morgan try to find time for each other.
